verses.text: \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \add when he was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according to all that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ He in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* them.

And he brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and gathered them \w together|strong="H0622"\w* into the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* me, ye \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* now yourselves, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w filthiness|strong="H5079"\w* out of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.

For our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* him, and have turned \w away|strong="H5437"\w* their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* from the \w habitation|strong="H4908"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \add their\add* \w backs|strong="H6203"\w*.  +  r 29.6  t turned their…: Heb. given the neck *

Also they have shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, and put \w out|strong="H3518"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, and have not \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* nor \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Wherefore the \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was upon \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and he hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them to \w trouble|strong="H2189"\w*, to \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and to \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, as ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* with your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 29.8 \ft trouble: Heb. commotion\f*

For, lo, our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* and our \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \add are\add* in \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* for this.

Now \add it is\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* may turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from us.

My \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, be not now \w negligent|strong="H7952"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* you to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, to \w serve|strong="H8334"\w* him, and that ye should \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him, and burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*.\f + \fr 29.11 \ft be not…: or, be not now deceived\f*\f + \fr 29.11 \ft burn…: or, offer sacrifice\f*

¶ Then the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w Mahath|strong="H4287"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amasai|strong="H6022"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*: and of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abdi|strong="H5660"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehalelel|strong="H3094"\w*: and of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w*; \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zimmah|strong="H2155"\w*, and \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w*:

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elizaphan|strong="H0469"\w*; \w Shimri|strong="H8113"\w*, and \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*: and of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*; \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, and \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*:

And of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*; \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*: and of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*; \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*.

And they \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, by the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 29.15  t by the words…: or, in the business of the \+nd LORD\+nd* *

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the inner \w part|strong="H6441"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* \add it\add*, and brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* all the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* that they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* into the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w took|strong="H6901"\w* \add it\add*, to carry \add it\add* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* into the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*.

Now they \w began|strong="H2490"\w* on the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w*, and on the \w eighth|strong="H8083"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they to the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: so they \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and in the \w sixteenth|strong="H8337"\w* day of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* they made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w*.

Then they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H6441"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, with all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and the \w shewbread|strong="H4635"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, with all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof.

Moreover all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, which \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* in his \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* did cast \w away|strong="H2186"\w* in his \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w*, have we \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*, and, behold, they \add are\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Then \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w he|strong="H6842"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* for the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, and for the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and for \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. And he \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \add them\add* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

So they \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w bullocks|strong="H1241"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w received|strong="H6901"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \add it\add* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: likewise, when they had \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, they \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: they \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* also the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, and they \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And they brought \w forth|strong="H5066"\w* the he \w goats|strong="H8163"\w* \add for\add* the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*; and they \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon them:\f + \fr 29.23 \ft forth: Heb. near\f*

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* them, and they made \w reconciliation|strong="H2398"\w* with their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \add that\add* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \add should be made\add* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*: for \add so was\add* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.  +  r 29.25  t commandment of the \+nd LORD\+nd*: Heb. commandment by the hand of the \+nd LORD\+nd* *  +  r 29.25  t by: Heb. by the hand of *

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* with the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*.

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. And \w when|strong="H6256"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w*, the \w song|strong="H7892"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \add also\add* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, and with the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* \add ordained\add* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 29.27 \ft when: Heb. in the time\f*\f + \fr 29.27 \ft the instruments: Heb. hands of instruments\f*

And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*, and the \w singers|strong="H7892"\w* \w sang|strong="H7891"\w*, and the \w trumpeters|strong="H2689"\w* \w sounded|strong="H2690"\w*: \add and\add* all \add this continued\add* until the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* was \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 29.28 \ft singers: Heb. song\f*

And when they had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w offering|strong="H5927"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and all that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* with him \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* themselves, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*.\f + \fr 29.29 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

Moreover \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to sing \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*. And they sang \w praises|strong="H1984"\w* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, and they bowed their \w heads|strong="H6915"\w* and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*.

Then \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Now ye have \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* yourselves unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* and thank \w offerings|strong="H8426"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* and thank \w offerings|strong="H8426"\w*; and as many as were of a \w free|strong="H5081"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*.  +  r 29.31  t consecrated…: or, filled your hand *

And the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, which the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w*, was threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H1241"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*: all these \add were\add* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the consecrated \w things|strong="H6944"\w* \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

But the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* were too \w few|strong="H4592"\w*, so that they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w flay|strong="H6584"\w* all the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*: wherefore their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* did \w help|strong="H2388"\w* them, till the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* was \w ended|strong="H3615"\w*, and until the \add other\add* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* had \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves: for the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add were\add* more \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* themselves than the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 29.34 \ft did help…: Heb. strengthened them\f*

And also the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \add were\add* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, with the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and the drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* for \add every\add* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*. So the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was set in \w order|strong="H3559"\w*.

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* was \add done\add* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*.
